x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement:
Daily commuting is a major source of stress and logistical complexity for working professionals. Employees face uncertainties about parking availability, transportation options, process for securing permits/benefits
Employees unsure how/where to park or if they’re eligible for transit/parking benefits. Forgotten renewals and surprise fines for expired/invalid permits. Difficulty discovering alternative options (bike share, public transport, carpool spots). No easy way to report parking issues or get real-time availability.

x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

Unified commuter portal View parking/transit benefit eligibility, apply for permits and browse alternative commuting options.
Real-time parking availability updates and notifications for reserved/carpool spots.
Self-service permit renewals and application tracking, no paper forms or office visits.
Integration with public transport/bike share: See schedules and incentive status.
Instant issue reporting blocked spaces, safety concerns or request help.
Personal dashboard/Reports Track commute costs, benefit usage, environmental impact.

ServiceNow Components: 

Service Portal/ESC/UI Builder Page: For friendly access, applications, renewals, status tracking.
Flow Designer: Automate requests, renewals, approvals, reminders, and issue escalation, Connect to permit databases, parking hardware systems, local transit APIs or city services.
Mobile App: Access all commuter features from any device.
Platform/Performance Analytics: Utilization dashboards, waitlist stats, monthly reporting.
Integration : To Facilities Management (Manage space allocation, maintenance and reporting.)

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

Facilities & Asset Management: Linking with existing office/parking space and asset management tools.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Integration with Physical Parking Systems: Real-time space monitoring requires IoT sensors, cameras, RFID readers or entry/exit gates, integrated via APIs/Webhooks.
